黚字的基本解释

黚
qián
浅黄黑色。

黚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》巨淹切，平鹽，羣。］
［《廣韻》巨金切，平侵，羣。］
(1)水名。汉犍为郡符县有黚水，南至鄨入江。见《汉书·地理志上》。
(2)地名，在湖南省。

黚字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黚； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1519第19
【唐韻】巨淹切【集韻】其淹切，?音箝。【說文】淺黃黑也。【廣雅】黑也。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】犍爲郡符縣有黚水，南至鄨。　又縣名。古黚陽縣在武陵。　又【廣韻】巨金切【集韻】渠今切，?音琴。又【集韻】紀炎切，音〈兀兼〉。又古暗切，音紺。義?同。

黚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
黚字的起名意思

浅黄黑色。

Bian
Basic explanation of words
Bian
qián
Light yellow black.
Bian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" giant flooded cut, flat salt, group. ]
["Guangyun" giant gold cut, flat invasion, group. ]
(1) Water name. Han Qian is the county of Junfu County, with Bianshui River, and the south reaches Hulijiang. See "Book of Han Geography".
(2) The place name is in Hunan Province.
Bian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Black Word Department] 　黚; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1519 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Juyan cut [Ji Yun] its drown cut, sound pliers. [Said the text] Light yellow and black. [Guang Ya] Hei Ye.　Also known as water. [Pre-Han·Geography] Qianwei Junfu County has Bianshui, and the south reaches Yi.　Also the county name. Guyuyang County is in Wuling.　[Guangyun] Giant Golden Cut [Jiyun] Qu Jin cut,? Yinqin. Also [Jiyun] Ji Yanqie, sound "Wu Jian". And the ancient secretly cut, the sound is cyanotic. Righteous? Same.
Bian

Name meaning
Light yellow black.
qián
прил.
1) жёлто-серый
2) чёрный (также древнее название реки на террит. нынешней пров. Сычуань)
